title: Loading spinner appears during data fetch on dashboard load
description: Verify that the loading spinner is displayed while the dashboard data is being asynchronously fetched upon navigating to the root path `/`.

steps.description: Navigate to the root path `/` to access the dashboard.
Check that a loading spinner is rendered during the data fetch period.

title: Error message and retry button on data fetch failure
description: Ensure that if the dashboard data fetch fails, an error message and a retry button are displayed, and clicking retry attempts data loading again.

steps.description: Simulate data fetch failure by interrupting backend connectivity.
Verify that an appropriate error message is shown with a retry button.
Click the retry button.
Confirm the system attempts to fetch the data again and either loading spinner or data appears accordingly.

title: Dashboard header displays correct title, description, and data status badge
description: Verify that upon successful data load, the dashboard header shows the correct title 'Dashboard', description, and a data status badge indicating 'Live Data' or 'Demo Mode'.

steps.description: Load dashboard successfully with backend connected.
Check that the header shows the title 'Dashboard' and correct descriptive text.
Verify the data status badge reads 'Live Data' with the correct icon.
Simulate backend disconnection to cause fallback demo mode.
Ensure the data status badge switches to 'Demo Mode' with relevant icon.

title: Stats grid displays all 7 KPI cards with correct data and trend indicators
description: Validate that the stats grid renders 7 KPI cards showing current metric values, trend directions (up/down/neutral), percentage changes, and corresponding icons.

steps.description: Load dashboard with active data connection.
Confirm exactly 7 KPI cards are shown for water production, electricity usage, STP inlet flow, TSE output, STP economic impact, active contractors, and total assets.
Verify that each card displays the correct icon, the current numeric value, trend indicator arrow direction, and percentage change.

title: Water Production area chart renders accurately with tooltips and legends
description: Ensure that the Water Production area chart displays accurate historical data for the last 8 months and that hovering shows detailed tooltips and visible legends.

steps.description: Navigate to the dashboard page with loaded data.
Check that the Water Production area chart is rendered correctly for the last 8 months.
Hover over various data points on the area chart.
Verify that tooltips appear with detailed data and legends remain visible and accurate.

title: STP Treatment overview bar chart renders with interactive tooltips and legends
description: Validate that the STP Treatment overview bar chart displays comparison data for STP inlet and TSE output over 8 months and supports interactive tooltips and legends.

steps.description: Access the dashboard with data loaded.
Confirm the bar chart shows correct data for STP inlet flow and TSE output across 8 months.
Hover over individual bars in the chart.
Ensure interactive tooltips display correct values and legends highlight relevant series.

title: Recent activity feed filters correctly by alert types
description: Test the recent activity feed filtering capability by all, critical, warning, and info alert types, verifying the active filter button highlight and accurate filtered results.

steps.description: Load dashboard with recent activity feed displaying mixed alert types.
Click on the 'All' filter button.
Confirm that all recent activity items (critical, warning, info) are displayed and the 'All' button is highlighted.
Click on the 'Critical' filter button.
Verify only critical alerts are displayed and the 'Critical' button is highlighted.
Click on the 'Warning' filter button.
Check that only warning alerts appear and 'Warning' button is active.
Click on the 'Info' filter button.
Ensure only informational alerts are shown and 'Info' button is highlighted.

title: Hover effects on stat cards and activity items provide visual feedback
description: Verify that hovering over KPI stat cards and recent activity feed items triggers expected UI feedback such as tooltip display, highlight changes, or cursor changes to enhance interactivity.

steps.description: Hover mouse pointer over each KPI stat card.
Check that hover effects such as shadow, color change, or tooltip appear as designed.
Hover over recent activity feed items.
Confirm consistent hover style changes and tooltip details appear for activity items.

title: Responsive layout adjusts grids and charts across viewport sizes
description: Validate that the dashboard layout, including stats grid and charts, adjusts correctly on various screen sizes: mobile, tablet, desktop, and large desktop.

steps.description: Open the dashboard on a mobile-size viewport.
Verify that the layout stacks elements vertically with readable charts and cards.
Resize or open dashboard on a tablet viewport.
Check the grid adjusts to fit both cards and charts comfortably and remains user-friendly.
Resize or open dashboard on desktop and large desktop screens.
Ensure grid and charts spread out properly, maximizing available space with no overlapping or clipping.

title: Data status badge accurately reflects live or demo mode state
description: Confirm that the data status badge switches between 'Live Data' and 'Demo Mode' states correctly based on backend connectivity, including icon changes and text.

steps.description: Load dashboard with working backend connection.
Check that the data status badge shows 'Live Data' and appropriate icon.
Simulate loss of backend connectivity or data fetch failure.
Ensure the status badge updates instantly to 'Demo Mode' with distinct icon indicating fallback mock data.

title: Dark mode rendering and accessibility contrast validation
description: Verify that the dashboard UI correctly renders in dark mode and meets accessibility contrast standards for text, icons, and interactive elements.

steps.description: Enable dark mode on the application.
Confirm all text, icons, and UI elements render with colors that comply with WCAG contrast ratios.
Ensure no visual artifacts or readability issues occur in dark mode.
